name: Brick Buster: Pizza Pursuit
description:
(Wait a few seconds if screen is grey)

Help John get to the pizza place in time, breaking bricks and avoiding people who block his way. Reach a certain speed to break bricks, slow down to avoid people, and arrive on time. The more levels you go through, the more difficult it gets.

-------Controls------- -----Main Menu-----

Enter/Z/6: Start

R/4: Reset highscore (If held for 3 seconds)

-----In-Game-----

A/Left arrow/4: Move left

D/Right arrow/6: Move right
